channel.title: I got a problem with connections and trading
channel.description:
I use richscape source, and its based of dodian.
but the problem is dodian blocked same ip trade, and i got a problem with that because server thinks every1 has same ip as mine i tryed to change port forwarding tryed some things on no-ip. but didnt helped some1 know what to do?
things i tried
No-Ip: when u make a host and u see that ip box its already filled in with ur ip, i changed that into ip-adres from cmd>ipconfig. when u do that u can trade but slowly peaple get logged off and when they try to loggin error to connecting server, and when u check on mscp and runelocus it says offline. so i changed back and it was online.
tried to delete same ip trade block: didn't help dodian is really hard :( please help :)

@xsk1lzx wrote:

u can get me the download then i can look it on…

@super-expres wrote:

I use richscape source, and its based of dodian.

but the problem is dodian blocked same ip trade, and i got a problem with that because server thinks every1 has same ip as mine i tryed to change port forwarding tryed some things on no-ip. but didnt helped some1 know what to do?

things i tried

No-Ip: when u make a host and u see that ip box its already filled in with ur ip, i changed that into ip-adres from cmd>ipconfig. when u do that u can trade but slowly peaple get logged off and when they try to loggin error to connecting server, and when u check on mscp and runelocus it says offline. so i changed back and it was online.
